timeline.message:
Merge pull request #3 from constellation-app/master

Merge to dev fork

Merge pull request #4 from constellation-app/master

Merge into my fork
Only enable/set editable custom datetime format text field when CUSTOM is selected.

timeline.bodyText:
In general it is good practice to do the equals check the other way to avoid potential null pointer errors if you have a constant so:
"CUSTOM".equals(formatParam.getStringValue())
timeline.author: arcturus2
